ResearchProjectDef.label: Medication Synthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Medication Synthesis unlocks Medication Synthesis Workstations which grants the ability to take certian raw plants and chemicals and synthesize either into useful chemicals or directly into medication or medicinal form.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Deep Fermentation Tank
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build a distillery to brew the strongest of alcohols and spirits!
